messages.title: Dear Voter
messages.content: I have lived in Leigh since 1981, and been a member of UKIP since 2010. I am a professional engineer and had a career in the oil industry, retiring in 1996. I am now an active volunteer engaged with Southend Association of Voluntary Services and Southend & District Pensioners Campaign. This experience shows me how poor some of our local service provision is. Southend Hospital's A & E should NOT be downgraded, and there is a lack of funding for Social Care. The wasteful Foreign Aid budget can provide funding here. Yours sincerely, David Stansfield

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Theresa May completely failed to control immigration as Home Secretary and since she's been in government, immigration has risen by more than 1.8 million people.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Wasting Your Money on Foreign Aid
keyPolicies.policyDescription: She is fully committed to bingeing £14 billion a year of your money on so-called foreign ‘aid’.
The Tories have U-turned on their pledge to scrap the hated ECHR. It currently stops us deporting criminals and terrorists and even makes us pay them compensation.
She won’t commit to protecting our fishermen from future Brussels controls.
Since 2010, May’s Tories have paid £50 billion of EU membership fees. That money should have employed tens of thousands of nurses and carers in our NHS.
While the Tories and Labour self-destruct and the Lib Dems sell us out to the EU, only UKIP will fight to get the best deal for our nation’s future.
